sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: A freight train carrying 20 containers and a cargo worth almost 10 million euros has left Hefei in China for Budapest. It is the first ever train cargo delivery of its kind between the two cities. The trip will take 16 to 18 days, much quicker than sending freight by ship, and covers over 10,000 kilometers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The containers are full of products like solar panel components, electric machines, and inverters made in China's Anhui province, where Hefei is the capital.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: But this is not China's first freight train to Europe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: In 2014, Anhui launched this service and since then, there have been 2,500 trips made to 85 cities in 18 countries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: So far this year, there have been a total of 500 freight train trips between China and Europe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: After two difficult years because of the pandemic, Cyprus tourism seems to be up and running again.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: However, there's a rather serious challenge to overcome. sentences.sentence: Nobody was prepared for this huge change. It's a difficult problem to deal with, but somehow we're trying to cope with it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: We've somewhat limited the damage, but it's impossible to replace this huge number of customers. In 2019, Cyprus hosted nearly 4 million tourists, of which more than 780,000 were Russian.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07

sentences.sentence: Russians and most likely Ukrainians won't come to Cyprus, which will mean a loss of an estimated 600 million euros, money which will need to be found elsewhere.
